title: Neduvaali Lyrics Osthi Osthe Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Rahul Nambiar, Mahathi
Song: Nedvaali
Lyrics : Yuga Bharath
Movie: Osthi
Music : Thaman s

Neduvaali.. adiye neduvaali..
udumba udumba
Ammaadi nenja neeyum kavvi poriye

Neduvaali.. adiye neduvaali..
arumba arumba
ayaiyo enna neeyum killi poriye

Ada dumeeludthaan ada dumeeludhaan
avan gunnula suttaa dumeeludhaan
Ada dammaaludhaan ada dammaaludhaan
ava kannula sutta, kannula sutta

Vari variya, thala mudiye
iva azhagula naanga thaangurome adiye
Maniya maniya, iru vizhiye
iva nadaiyila neenga maaruveenga vazhiye

Hey hey hey koodudhu aasai thoonudhu pesa
maaridudhe buthi
Dhaavaniyil eriyarame pathi
Indha paya pula azhaga ne manasula manasula
edukanum aarathi

Ada dumeeludthaan ada dumeeludhaan
mavan gunnula suttaa dumeeludhaan
Ada dammaaludhaan ada dammaaludhaan
maami kannula sutta dammaaludhaan

Neduvaali.. adiye neduvaali..
kannula sutta, kannula sutta

Unga control il oora vaipeengale
ippa control illaama poreengale
kuri thappaama nethu suttenada
ippa kannaala soodu pattenadaa

Sema dhillaana aalu summa illa
udambengenyum moola poiye illa
idhu pollatha casesu aana illa

hey hey hey kaavalu kaaka vendiya aala kaanala paarappa
fire-ra odane podappa
Ada orusana nodiyila thirudana pudikira
manasa nee thedappa  (Ada dumeeluthaan ....)

Indha pennaala thookam ketaarunga
edhum unnaama yekkam kondaarunga
nadu saamathil rondhu povingale
ippa roomkul rondhu poringale

Pala seivora pottu setharunga
olungilaama pootum pottarunga
ipa ultava maari ponaarunga..

hey hey hey aalam therinju kaalayum vacha
dhillae irukaadhu
thedi vandha muthum kidaikaadhu
Thuni thunichal manasula irukura variyile
thappu onnum nadakaadhu   (Ada dumeeluthaan ....)
